name: MagicLamp
0:
”Alexa, ask MagicLamp to turn leds on”
”Alexa, ask MagicLamp to zing next”
”Alexa, ask MagicLamp for color Red”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic lamp
des: Voice control of Japanese-style lamp with integrated LED strips offering multiple "zings" (LED shows). This is currently a one-off use for my IoT development project.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
